channel.title: Passive Scanner Add-on on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Passive Scanner Add-on on ZAP

item.title: Passive Scanner Automation Framework - passiveScan-config Job
item.description: Passive Scanner Automation Framework - passiveScan-config Job This job allows you to manage the passive scan configuration. It is covered in the video: ZAP Chat 08 Automation Framework Part 2 - Environment. The passive scanner runs against all requests and responses that are generated by ZAP or are proxied through it.

item.title: Passive Scanner Automation Framework Support
item.description: Passive Scanner Automation Framework Support This add-on supports the Automation Framework. Jobs The following automation jobs are supported by this add-on: passiveScan-config - passive scan configuration passiveScan-wait - waits for the passive scanner to finish processing the current queue

item.title: Passive Scanner Automation Framework - passiveScan-wait Job
item.description: Passive Scanner Automation Framework - passiveScan-wait Job This job waits for the passive scanner to finishing scanning the requests and responses in the current queue. You should typically run this job after the jobs that explore you application, such as the spider jobs or those that import API definitions.
